title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 67 - Lead Poisoning Prevention And Control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 67 - Lead Poisoning Prevention And Control

State Regulations

Subpart 67-1 - Screening And Follow-up (§ 67-1.1 to 67-1.6)

Subpart 67-2 - Environmental Assessment And Abatement (§ 67-2.1 to 67-2.8)

Subpart 67-3 - Reporting Of Blood Lead Levels (§ 67-3.1 to 67-3.3)

Subpart 67-4 - Lead Testing in School Drinking Water (§ 67-4.1 to 67-4.9)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 67

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 206[1][n], 1370-a; art. 13, title X
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
